reviewText: Very nice product. lots of fun.
Hours of behind the scenes look at Wrath of the Lich king. A definite collector item if you missed out on the collectors edition.

Hi,

I just got the whole set from DC comix It would be great you see this set as a DVD movie the art is real good they need to make a movie based on this game that would be real nice. I hope that they do and soon.

  Candy
